title: Augusta County: Jedediah Hotchkiss to Sara A. Hotchkiss, March 1, 1863
summary: Hotchkiss writes to his wife, describing the weather in camp, the capture of Yankee cavalry, the illness of a friend, and politics. He also discusses the shooting of deserters and reasons that soldiers desert.
